Posts.Content: Hi I like you have just been to dentist and what I thought was fragments of bone turned out to be the actual jawbone exposed the dentist shaved the bone back in the hope the gum will heal over it like yourself I have not got the two main causes of the causes of exposed jawbone , but what I do have also like yourself is peripheral neuropathy my case is virtually the same as yourself , I am going to the doctor tomorrow to see what he says .  It was very interesting reading your story as it was like for like as me , I'm 48 years old and have had peripheral neuropathy for seven years .  Regards Lisa782
Posts.Title: Jaw Bone Problems
